tool_description: Analyzes shipment status updates to detect and categorize delivery exceptions, delays, or issues requiring attention.
error_messages: Invalid date format: Dates must be in ISO 8601 format.
Empty tracking events: At least one tracking event is required.
Invalid status: Current status must be a recognized shipment status.
Date logic error: Ship date cannot be after expected delivery date.
usage: Provide current_status, tracking_events array, expected_delivery, ship_date, and service_type. The tool will analyze for exceptions and provide categorized alerts.

exception_type.description: Type of exception (delay, address_issue, weather, damaged, etc.)

days_delayed.description: Number of days delayed from original estimate

recommended_action.description: Recommended action to resolve the exception
